content: When I was in my first years of grade school, my father taught me a haiku and I longed to be a poet. On my Tanabata wish, I also wrote "Please make me a poet". Thirty years have passed and my wish has been granted. I am without doubt an invalid.
translations: ita:Quando ero nei miei primi anni di scuola elementare, mio padre mi ha insegnato un haiku e desideravo essere un poeta. Ne
